extracted_playbook.condition: Which Mendix Runtime version is in use?

extracted_playbook.title: No Fix Available for Mendix Runtime V8
extracted_playbook.description: Currently, no fix is planned for Mendix Runtime V8. Consider upgrading to a supported version.

extracted_playbook.title: Update Mendix Runtime V9
extracted_playbook.description: Update to Mendix Runtime V9.24.29 or later versions to mitigate the vulnerability.

extracted_playbook.title: Update Mendix Runtime V10
extracted_playbook.description: Update to Mendix Runtime V10.16.0 or later versions to mitigate the vulnerability.

extracted_playbook.title: Update Mendix Runtime V10.6
extracted_playbook.description: Update to Mendix Runtime V10.6.15 or later versions to mitigate the vulnerability.

extracted_playbook.title: Update Mendix Runtime V10.12
extracted_playbook.description: Update to Mendix Runtime V10.12.7 or later versions to mitigate the vulnerability.

extracted_playbook.title: Implement Alternative Authentication
extracted_playbook.description: Do not use basic authentication. Set up an alternative authentication module (e.g., SAML, MendixSSO) or your own Identity Provider (IDP).

extracted_playbook.title: Protect Network Access
extracted_playbook.description: Protect network access to devices with appropriate mechanisms as per Siemens' operational guidelines for industrial security.

extracted_playbook.title: Minimize Network Exposure
extracted_playbook.description: Minimize network exposure for all control system devices and/or systems, ensuring they are not accessible from the Internet.

extracted_playbook.title: Use Firewalls and Isolate Networks
extracted_playbook.description: Locate control system networks and remote devices behind firewalls and isolate them from business networks.

extracted_playbook.title: Use Secure Remote Access Methods
extracted_playbook.description: When remote access is required, use secure methods such as VPNs, ensuring they are updated to the most current version available.

extracted_playbook.title: Perform Impact Analysis and Risk Assessment
extracted_playbook.description: Perform proper impact analysis and risk assessment prior to deploying defensive measures.

extracted_playbook.title: Report Suspected Malicious Activity
extracted_playbook.description: Follow established internal procedures and report findings to CISA for tracking and correlation against other incidents.

extracted_playbook.title: Protect Against Social Engineering Attacks
extracted_playbook.description: Do not click web links or open attachments in unsolicited email messages. Refer to resources on avoiding email scams and social engineering attacks.
